lines.text:
[holding an iron]
Which way do you want the pleats turned?
i hope some fresh air gropes its way in here - it's stifling!
Hey Moe, I think we made da wrong toin!

[on Grandma buying her a new typewriter]
Oh, gee darling, how can i ever repay you?
Aw, it's simple, just write another 'Gone With The Wind'.
I'm awful glad you came, officer.
So you're new in this neighborhood, ain't ya?
Yeah, we just moved in today.
Well, if you're smart, you'll move out tomorrow.

[frustrated]
Well, for a place with a bad location and no neon sign, we're doing a whale of a business!

[about his mother-in-law]
I wanna wait until Mother's Day, and then sock her.

[reading from the sample package of 'Natures Broom', a fiber cereal]
"Delicious with strawberries and cream". Humph, what isn't?

[reading cereal box]
Nature's Broom. Gonna have breakfast all day long...
Oh, but it's good for you. It's roughage.
I like to vary it with a little smoothage, like a steak!
